document.full_text: nfl hall of famer andy robustelli, a pro bowl defensive end for the los angeles rams and new york giants and a consistent winner on the gridiron, died on tuesday at age 85, the nfl said.
document.title: hall of fame defensive end robustelli dies at 85
lines_and_colors: nfl hall of famer andy robustelli, a pro bowl defensive end for the los angeles rams and new york giants and a consistent winner on the gridiron, died on tuesday at age 85, the nfl said.
